verses.verse: And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> when<WH3588> all<WH3605> these<WH428> things<WH1697> are come<WH935> upon<WH5921> thee, the blessing<WH1293> and the curse,<WH7045> which<WH834> I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> thee, and thou shalt call<WH7725> them to<WH413> mind<WH3824> among all<WH3605> the nations,<WH1471> whither<WH834> <WH8033> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath driven<WH5080> thee,

And shalt return<WH7725> unto<WH5704> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and shalt obey<WH8085> his voice<WH6963> according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day,<WH3117> thou<WH859> and thy children,<WH1121> with all<WH3605> thine heart,<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> thy soul;<WH5315>

That then the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will turn<WH7725> <WH853> thy captivity,<WH7622> and have compassion<WH7355> upon thee, and will return<WH7725> and gather<WH6908> thee from all<WH4480> <WH3605> the nations,<WH5971> whither<WH834> <WH8033> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath scattered<WH6327> thee.

If <WH518> any of thine be<WH1961> driven out<WH5080> unto the outermost<WH7097> parts of heaven,<WH8064> from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> will the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> gather<WH6908> thee, and from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> will he fetch<WH3947> thee:

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will bring<WH935> thee into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> thy fathers<WH1> possessed,<WH3423> and thou shalt possess<WH3423> it; and he will do thee good,<WH3190> and multiply<WH7235> thee above thy fathers.<WH4480> <WH1>

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will circumcise<WH4135> <WH853> thine heart,<WH3824> and the heart<WH3824> of thy seed,<WH2233> to love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with all<WH3605> thine heart,<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> thy soul,<WH5315> that<WH4616> thou mayest live.<WH2416>

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will put<WH5414> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH428> curses<WH423> upon<WH5921> thine enemies,<WH341> and on<WH5921> them that hate<WH8130> thee, which<WH834> persecuted<WH7291> thee.

And thou<WH859> shalt return<WH7725> and obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD,<WH3068> and do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> his commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day.<WH3117>

And the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> will make thee plenteous<WH3498> in every<WH3605> work<WH4639> of thine hand,<WH3027> in the fruit<WH6529> of thy body,<WH990> and in the fruit<WH6529> of thy cattle,<WH929> and in the fruit<WH6529> of thy land,<WH127> for good:<WH2896> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> will again<WH7725> rejoice<WH7797> over<WH5921> thee for good,<WH2896> as<WH834> he rejoiced<WH7797> over<WH5921> thy fathers: <WH1>

If <WH3588> thou shalt hearken<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> to keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> which are written<WH3789> in this<WH2088> book<WH5612> of the law,<WH8451> and if<WH3588> thou turn<WH7725> unto<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with all<WH3605> thine heart,<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> thy soul.<WH5315>

For <WH3588> this<WH2063> commandment<WH4687> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day,<WH3117> it<WH1931> is not<WH3808> hidden<WH6381> from<WH4480> thee, neither<WH3808> is it<WH1931> far off.<WH7350>

It <WH1931> is not<WH3808> in heaven,<WH8064> that thou shouldest say,<WH559> Who<WH4310> shall go up<WH5927> for us to heaven,<WH8064> and bring<WH3947> it unto us, that we may hear<WH8085> it, and do<WH6213> it?

Neither <WH3808> is it<WH1931> beyond<WH4480> <WH5676> the sea,<WH3220> that thou shouldest say,<WH559> Who<WH4310> shall go<WH5674> over<WH413> <WH5676> the sea<WH3220> for us, and bring<WH3947> it unto us, that we may hear<WH8085> it, and do<WH6213> it?
But <WH3588> the word<WH1697> is very<WH3966> nigh<WH7138> unto<WH413> thee, in thy mouth,<WH6310> and in thy heart,<WH3824> that thou mayest do<WH6213> it.
See, <WH7200> I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> thee this day<WH3117> <WH853> life<WH2416> and good,<WH2896> and death<WH4194> and evil;<WH7451>

In that<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117> to love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> to walk<WH1980> in his ways,<WH1870> and to keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> and his judgments,<WH4941> that thou mayest live<WH2421> and multiply:<WH7235> and the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall bless<WH1288> thee in the land<WH776> whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.
But if<WH518> thine heart<WH3824> turn away,<WH6437> so that thou wilt not<WH3808> hear,<WH8085> but shalt be drawn away,<WH5080> and worship<WH7812> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and serve<WH5647> them;

I denounce<WH5046> unto you this day,<WH3117> that<WH3588> ye shall surely perish,<WH6> <WH6> and that ye shall not<WH3808> prolong<WH748> your days<WH3117> upon<WH5921> the land,<WH127> whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> passest over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan<WH3383> to go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.

I call<WH5749> <WH853> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776> to record this day<WH3117> against you, that I have set<WH5414> before<WH6440> you life<WH2416> and death,<WH4194> blessing<WH1293> and cursing:<WH7045> therefore choose<WH977> life,<WH2416> that<WH4616> both thou<WH859> and thy seed<WH2233> may live: <WH2421>

That thou mayest love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and that thou mayest obey<WH8085> his voice,<WH6963> and that thou mayest cleave<WH1692> unto him: for<WH3588> he<WH1931> is thy life,<WH2416> and the length<WH753> of thy days:<WH3117> that thou mayest dwell<WH3427> in<WH5921> the land<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto thy fathers,<WH1> to Abraham,<WH85> to Isaac,<WH3327> and to Jacob,<WH3290> to give<WH5414> them.
